item.description:
This Sunday, June 26th, Danny and I are leading a special group ride for scooterists who ride a 150cc or more. We really hope you can join us. (Sorry we have to exclude those of you with 50cc's this time!!)

 

NOTE: We WON'T be meeting at the shop this time...

MEETING AT NOON - WOLLASTON BEACH

FINISH AT AROUND 3 OR 4 AT HINGHAM SHIPYARD PLAZA.

 

EXACT MEETING SPOT, MAP AND DIRECTIONS WILL BE ON OUR WEBSITE TOMORROW

    This is going to be an awesome scenic ride touring some of Danny's favorite hidden roads in the South Shore towns of Quincy, Hingham, Hull, Cohasset, and Scituate.

     Part of the objective for this ride is to give the Boston Globe Photographer the opportunity to get some group scooterist shots to accompany the feature story which is now ready for publishing.

    Some of you attended our recent Rally when the Boston Globe Reporter, Meg Murphy conducted interviews. She hopes that some of the same people she interviewed will attend this ride so they can get your picture to accompany what you contributed to the article.

     Our first stop (hopefully we can all find parking!) will be at Nantasket Beach for lunch of pizza, fried seafood and/or salt water taffy! Maybe you will pick up a tacky souvenir or vintage postcard of Paragon Park. 

     We'll be riding gorgeous roads along the shore and inland, including some lined with mansions. A couple more planned stops are at the country's oldest water tower and the Scituate lighthouse.

    Our final destination will be at the Hingham Shipyard Plaza where you can create your own sundae or parfait or get a smoothie at Red Mango Frozen Yogurt.

     Danny and I did this ride a few weeks ago and it was a fantastic one. We really hope you'll be able to join us.  

 

Please RSVP ASAP !

 

ps) Please don't forget to gas up before we meet.

 

 


 

Thanks,

Diane & Danny
item.how_to_find_us: Read on for Meet up location
item.name: Awesome South Shore Backroads Tour
